Tactical Shield

CSGO plugin adding a tactical shield to the game

Changelog Commands Installation Media Cvars AlliedModders

Installation

  • Plugin Installation

    Simply download tacticalshield.smx and place it in your server inside “csgo/addons/sourcemod/plugins/”. A map is currently being made to work along with this plugin. Get it here!

  • Custom Models Installation

    If you want to use custom models for your shield, download the custom_models.txt file and place it in your server inside “csgo/addons/sourcemod/gamedata/tacticalshield/”. If players do not see the model, make sure they have downloaded it. To force players to download models, use the plugin SM File/Folder Downloader and Precacher

Compatibility

  • TTT

    This plugin is compatible with Trouble in Terrorist Town for csgo by Bara. Just install TTT and Tactical Shield normally for it to work. You will want to set the cvars ts_price “30000” to prevent players from buying shields outside of the traitor/detective menu. Tactical Shield’s version 1.1.0 is not yet fully compatible with latest TTT. If you are using TTT and want a stable game, please do not update Tactical Shield yet.

  • MyJailShop

    This plugin is compatible with MyJailShop for csgo by shanapu. Just install MyJailShop and Tactical Shield normally for it to work. You will want to set the cvars ts_price “30000”, ts_buytime “0” to prevent players from buying shields outside of the shop. Also set ts_keep_between_rounds “0” to prevent players from keeping the shield between rounds.

  • Cameras and Drones

    Compatible with Cameras And Drones. You can use both plugins without any problem! (be sure to have the latest versions). If you find a bug, please post an issue on github.

Website and plugin maintained by Keplyx
